name: Community college attendance and receipt of an associate's degree among employed college graduates reporting a first bachelor's degree, by field of study and calendar year of degree: 2019
description: Community college attendance and receipt of an associate's degree among employed college graduates reporting a first bachelor's degree, by field of study and calendar year of degree: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_employed_college_graduates_attended_community_college_
variableMeasured.description: Employed College Graduates Attended Community College

variableMeasured.name: field_employed_college_graduates_earned_an_associate_s_degree_
variableMeasured.description: Employed College Graduates Earned An Associate S Degree

variableMeasured.name: field_recent_graduates_earned_first_bachelor_s_degree_2008_17_total_number_
variableMeasured.description: Recent Graduates Earned First Bachelor S Degree 2008 17 Total Number

variableMeasured.name: field_recent_graduates_earned_first_bachelor_s_degree_2008_17_attended_community_college_
variableMeasured.description: Recent Graduates Earned First Bachelor S Degree 2008 17 Attended Community College

variableMeasured.name: field_recent_graduates_earned_first_bachelor_s_degree_2008_17_earned_an_associate_s_degree_
variableMeasured.description: Recent Graduates Earned First Bachelor S Degree 2008 17 Earned An Associate S Degree

variableMeasured.name: field_past_graduates_earned_first_bachelor_s_degree_s_2007_or_earlier_total_number_
variableMeasured.description: Past Graduates Earned First Bachelor S Degree S 2007 Or Earlier Total Number

variableMeasured.name: field_past_graduates_earned_first_bachelor_s_degree_s_2007_or_earlier_attended_community_college_
variableMeasured.description: Past Graduates Earned First Bachelor S Degree S 2007 Or Earlier Attended Community College

variableMeasured.name: field_past_graduates_earned_first_bachelor_s_degree_s_2007_or_earlier_earned_an_associate_s_degree_
variableMeasured.description: Past Graduates Earned First Bachelor S Degree S 2007 Or Earlier Earned An Associate S Degree

notes: Numbers are rounded to the nearest 1,000. Excludes college graduates who earned a first bachelor's degree abroad (n = 3,879,000) and those who did not report a first bachelor's degree (n = 1,958,000).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates, 2019.
